p: We selected 145 phyto-compounds from Kabasura kudineer complex ( Supplementary Table 1). A total of 145 two-dimensional ligands were generated with ACD chem sketch. The ligands extracted in the mol format were converted to pdb format using OPEN BABEL software ( www.vcclab.org/lab/babel/start.html). The docking tool iGEMDOCK v2.0 was used for the rapid virtual screening of the extracted compounds (Yang and Chen, 2004). Based on the highest energy value, best compounds from each plant of Kabasura kudineer complex were exposed to accurate molecular docking ( Supplementary Table 2).
